googlePlayConsole.shortDescription: Step-by-step assembly guides, AI troubleshooting, and barcode scanning for any product.

fullDescription.en-US:
Guid provides clear, step-by-step assembly instructions, setup guides, and troubleshooting help for products from IKEA, Wayfair, Home Depot, Amazon, Target, and more.

FEATURES

★ ASSEMBLY GUIDES — Swipe through illustrated step-by-step instructions with pinch-to-zoom on every diagram. Track your progress and pick up where you left off.

★ AI TROUBLESHOOTING — Get instant help from our AI assistant. Describe your problem in plain English or snap a photo of the issue for visual diagnosis.

★ BARCODE SCANNER — Scan product barcodes or QR codes to instantly find the right guide. Works with EAN-13, UPC-A, Code128, and more.

★ OCR LABEL READER — Photograph product labels and article numbers. Our OCR technology extracts text automatically to find your product.

★ MULTI-RETAILER PRICE COMPARISON — See prices across multiple retailers and find the best deal with affiliate-tagged links.

★ OFFLINE GUIDES (Premium) — Download guides for use without internet. Perfect for assembly in areas with poor connectivity.

★ DARK MODE — Full dark mode support following your system preference for comfortable reading in any lighting.

★ PUSH NOTIFICATIONS — Get notified about new guides, maintenance reminders, and AI chat responses.

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION

Upgrade to Guid Premium for $9.99/month or $99.99/year:
• Unlimited AI chat sessions
• Offline guide downloads
• Priority AI processing
• Ad-free experience
• Photo diagnosis

Subscription automatically renews. Cancel anytime from Google Play Store > Subscriptions.

Privacy Policy: https://guid.how/privacy
Terms of Service: https://guid.how/terms
